thread.title: The most lovely hotel with THE MOST charming staff anywhere I've travelled
thread.title_full: The most lovely hotel with THE MOST charming staff anywhere I've travelled - Review of Hotel Joke - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: surreysarahjk
title: The most lovely hotel with THE MOST charming staff anywhere I've travelled
text: We are just back from a 2 night stay. The hotel is charming. Clean rooms comfy beds very quiet despite being 2 mins from the Moulin Rouge. Great shower. Lovely coffee great breakfast free snacks and drinks and quite possibly the most friendly and charming staff I've ever come across. I cannot recommend this hotel enough
